description: This file contains the SQL schema definitions for an academic learning management system, including table creation, indexes, triggers, and functions for managing users, courses, lessons, assignments, grades, and related entities.

methods.name: public.set_updated_at
methods.description: A generic trigger function that updates the 'updated_at' timestamp on table row updates.

methods.name: public.handle_new_user
methods.description: A trigger function to automatically create or update a profile record when a new user is inserted into auth.users.
